info.name: Dark Pi-Hole
info.additionalInfo:
02/11/19 - fixed dark theme for shop page and blog posts
02/03/19 - fixed dark theme for content post
01/13/19 - fixed dark theme for homepage
10/23/18 - added dark theme for doc.pi-hole.net

style.css:
@-moz-document domain("pi-hole.net") {
.panel-content,
.site-content-contain,
#subscribe-email input,
input[type="text"],
input[type="email"],
input[type="url"],
input[type="password"],
input[type="search"],
input[type="number"],
input[type="tel"],
input[type="range"],
input[type="date"],
input[type="month"],
input[type="week"],
input[type="time"],
input[type="datetime"],
input[type="datetime-local"],
input[type="color"],
textarea,
[id*="give-form"].give-fl-form.give-fl-style-give input.give-fl-input[type="email"],
[id*="give-form"].give-fl-form.give-fl-style-give input.give-fl-input[type="number"],
[id*="give-form"].give-fl-form.give-fl-style-give input.give-fl-input[type="password"],
[id*="give-form"].give-fl-form.give-fl-style-give input.give-fl-input[type="search"],
[id*="give-form"].give-fl-form.give-fl-style-give input.give-fl-input[type="tel"],
[id*="give-form"].give-fl-form.give-fl-style-give input.give-fl-input[type="text"],
[id*="give-form"].give-fl-form.give-fl-style-give input.give-fl-input[type="url"],
form[id*="give-form"] #give-final-total-wrap .give-donation-total-label,
form[id*="give-form"] #give-final-total-wrap .give-final-total-amount,
.navigation-top .wrap,
.main-navigation li li a,
form[id*="give-form"] .give-donation-amount #give-amount,
form[id*="give-form"] .give-donation-amount #give-amount-text,
form[id*="give-form"] .give-donation-amount .give-currency-symbol.give-currency-position-before,
[id*="give-form"] .give-recurring-donors-choice-period,
.give-btn,
.page-numbers.current,
select,
.navigation-top,
.page-content [data-id]:not([data-overlap]),
[data-id="stripped-coloured-icon-boxes"],
.features-coloured-icon-boxes-featurecol,
.footer,
.post-content-single,
.blog .content,
.archive .content,
.single-post .content,
.row_345,
.features-image-cards-cardtextrow,
.content-wrapper {
    background: #101010 !important;
    color: #e5e5e5 !important;
}

b,
strong,
pre,
p,
h2.widget-title,
code,
kbd,
tt,
var,
h2,
h3,
body h4,
body h1,
.give-goal-progress .income {
    color: #e5e5e5 !important;
}

.widget ul li,
.widget ol li {
    border-bottom: #101010;
    border-top: #101010;
}

.navigation-top a,
.page .panel-content .entry-title,
.page-title,
body.page:not(.twentyseventeen-front-page) .entry-title,
.entry-content a,
.entry-summary a,
.comment-content a,
.widget a,
.site-footer .widget-area a,
.posts-navigation a,
.widget_authors a strong {
    color: #3a3a3a;
}

.give-btn:hover,
#subscribe-email input,
code {
    background: #3a3a3a !important;
}

.nav-previous a,
.nav-next a,
.button {
    background: #3a3a3a !important;
    color: #e5e5e5;
}
}

@-moz-document domain("docs.pi-hole.net") {
.md-header-nav__topic,
.md-header[data-md-state="shadow"],
.md-main,
.md-search-result__meta,
.md-search-result__article,
.md-typeset h1,
.md-typeset h5,
.md-typeset ul li,
.md-typeset ol li,
.md-typeset,
.md-nav__title,
.md-nav__link,
.md-nav__item--nested > .md-nav__link,
.md-nav__link[data-md-state="blur"],
.md-search-result__teaser,
[data-md-toggle="search"]:checked ~ .md-header .md-search__input,
[data-md-toggle="search"]:checked ~ .md-header .md-search__input + .md-search__icon,
[data-md-toggle="search"]:checked ~ .md-header .md-search__input::placeholder,
[data-md-toggle="search"]:checked ~ .md-header .md-search__input:valid ~ .md-search__icon[type="reset"] {
    background: #101010;
    color: #e5e5e5;
}
}
